info.title: Business Partner
info.description:
A person, an organization, or a group of people or
organizations in which a company has a business interest.

x-sap-shortText:
A person, an organization, or a group of people or
organizations in which a company has a business interest.

tags.name: BusinessPartner
tags.description:
A person, an organization, or a group of people or
organizations in which a company has a business interest.

sap.graph.BusinessPartner.title: BusinessPartner

createdAt.description: Date and time the entity was created.

changedAt.description: Date and time the entity was changed last.

displayId.description: Human-readable identifier of the business partner.

name.description:
The formatted textual representation of the business
partner.

language.description: The language used to communicate with the business partner.

_language.description: The language used to communicate with the business partner.

addresses.description: The addresses for the business partner.

roles.description: The roles for the business partner.

identifications.description:
The identifications of the business partner. An
identification number can be used as an alternative
identifier for the business partner.

taxNumbers.description: The tax numbers of the business partner.

_corporateAccount.description: The corporate account this business partner represents.

_individualCustomer.description: The individual customer this business partner represents.

_contactPerson.description: The contact person this business partner represents.

_supplier.description: The supplier this business partner represents.

_workforcePerson.description: The workforce person this business partner represents.

sap.graph.BusinessPartner.description:
A person, an organization, or a group of people or
organizations in which a company has a business interest.

country.description: The country where the business partner is located.

_country.description: The country where the business partner is located.

region.description: The region where the business partner is located.

county.description: The county where the business partner is located.

city.description: The city where the business partner is located.

district.description: The district where the business partner is located.

residentialCity.description: The city of residence of the business partner.

postalCode.description: The postal code for the business partner.

street.description: The street address for the business partner.

streetPrefix.description:
An additional address field that is printed above the street
line.

additionalStreetPrefix.description:
An additional address field that is printed above the street
line.

streetSuffix.description:
An additional address field that is printed under the street
line.

additionalStreetSuffix.description:
An additional address field that is printed under the street
line.

poBoxNumber.description: The number of the post office box.

poBoxCountry.description: The country where the post office box is located.

_poBoxCountry.description: The country where the post office box is located.

poBoxRegion.description: The region where the post office box is located.

poBoxCity.description: The city where the post office box is located.

poBoxPostalCode.description: The postal code for the post office box.

careOfName.description: The in care of name (c/o) for the address.

phoneNumbers.description: The telephone numbers for the business partner.

mobilePhoneNumbers.description: The mobile telephone numbers for the business partner.

faxNumbers.description: The fax numbers for the business partner.

emailAddresses.description: The email addresses for the business partner.

websites.description: The websites for the business partner.

address.description: The default email address for the business partner.

isDefault.description:
Indicates it is the default email address for the business
partner.

number.description: The default fax number for the business partner.

isDefault.description:
Indicates it is the default fax number for the business
partner.

number.description:
The default mobile telephone number for the business
partner.

isDefault.description:
Indicates it is the default telephone number for the
business partner.

number.description: The default telephone number for the business partner.

isDefault.description:
Indicates it is the default mobile telephone number for the
business partner.

url.description: The default website for the business partner.

isDefault.description:
Indicates it is the default website for the business
partner.

identificationType.description:
The type of identification associated to the business
partner.

identificationNumber.description: The identification number for the business partner.

responsibleInstitution.description:
The institution that is responsible for giving the
identification number.

entryDate.description: The date the identification was entered in the system.

validFrom.description: The date from which the identification is valid.

validTo.description: The date until the identification is valid.

country.description: The country to which the identification belongs.

_country.description: The country associated to the identification.

region.description: The region to which the identification belongs.

roleCode.description: The code for the role of the business partner.

taxType.description: The tax type for the business partner.

taxNumber.description: The tax number for the business partner.
